main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a star-like object with flashing lights in Dayton, Ohio on August 12, 1968.
interesting points: The object was reported to have red and green flashing lights., The observer used binoculars to view the object clearly., The object appeared motionless for about 20 minutes before fading out of sight., The observer's daughter also saw the object and confirmed its appearance., The sighting was later followed by a request for additional details from the Air Force, which was not fulfilled by the observer.
sighted object: star-like object with red and green flashing lights
witness description: One civilian observer and his daughter.
